name: Catnap (JackLandy)
description:
A small game starring Sparx the Cat on his quest for a Catnap. Sparx must collect the rainbow feathers scattered about in order to open the cardboard box (his favourite napping place).

CONTROLS

Press 'a' and 'd' to move left and right respectively.

Tap 'w' to jump

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

REFERENCES

Background track:
https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/cute
